SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as new_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN source = 'stockx' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as stockx_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN source = 'ebay' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ebay_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN source = 'goat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as goat_orders,
  SUM(final_price) as total_revenue,
  AVG(final_price) as avg_order_value
FROM transactions.orders 
WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '15 minutes'
  AND status NOT IN ('cancelled', 'refunded')

SELECT 
  o.id,
  o.source,
  o.order_number,
  p.name as product_name,
  p.brand,
  o.size,
  o.final_price,
  o.status,
  o.created_at
FROM transactions.orders o
LEFT JOIN products.products p ON o.product_id = p.id
WHERE o.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '15 minutes'
  AND o.status NOT IN ('cancelled', 'refunded')
ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
LIMIT 10
